text: 5:10 Fofozir Gumazim 12:14; Rom 2:16; 14:10; Galesia 6:7; Kolosi 3:24-25; Akar Mogomem 22:12Guizbangɨra, e bar moghɨra Kraisɨn kotɨn otivightɨ, an en araziba tuisɨgham. Dughiar e nguazimɨn inivafɨzimɨn aven itim, e arazir aghuibagh ami, o arazir kurabagh ami, eghtɨ kotiamɨn dughiam e bar vaghvagh uan arazir amizibar ivezim iniam.
